metadata.title: CVE-2023-30362 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Buffer Overflow vulnerability in coap_send function in libcoap library4.3.1-103-g52cfd56 fixed in 4.3.1-120-ge242200 allows attackers to obtainsensitive information via malformed pdu.

criterions.comment: libcoap: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
